metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12214 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: In FreeImage 3.18.0, an out-of-bounds access occurs because of mishandling of the OpenJPEG j2k_read_ppm_v3 function in j2k.c. The value of l_N_ppm comes from the file read in, and the code does not consider that l_N_ppm may be greater than the size of p_header_data.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-09-06.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
